content.text: Match ends, Sevilla 2, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Sevilla 2, Almería 1.
Offside, Sevilla. Carlos Bacca tries a through ball, but Bryan Rabello is caught offside.
Fernando Soriano (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Marko Marin (Sevilla).
Ángel Trujillo (Almería) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Ivan Rakitic (Sevilla) because of an injury.
Goal!  Sevilla 2, Almería 1. Ivan Rakitic (Sevilla) header from the right side of the six yard box to the top left corner. Assisted by Marko Marin with a cross.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
